text: Didier Fernand Agathe (born 16 August 1975) is a French football manager and former professional footballer who most recently managed Chester-le-Street United. ==Career statistics== :Source: Club Season League Cup League Cup Other Total Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Raith Rovers 1999–2000 30 7 1 0 0 0 1 0 32 7 Hibernian 2000–01 5 4 0 0 1 0 - - 6 4 Celtic 2000–01 27 3 6 0 5 0 2 0 36 3 Celtic 2001–02 20 1 3 0 1 0 8 1 32 2 Celtic 2002–03 27 0 0 0 2 0 11 0 40 0 Celtic 2003–04 28 5 5 0 0 0 14 1 47 7 Celtic 2004–05 16 0 2 0 1 0 5 0 24 0 Celtic 2005–06 4 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 4 0 Celtic Total 122 9 16 0 5 0 40 2 183 11 Aston Villa 2006–07 5 0 0 0 1 0 - - 6 0 Career total 162 20 17 0 7 0 41 2 227 22 ==Honours== Celtic * Scottish Premier League (3): 2000–01, 2001–02, 2003–04 * Scottish Cup (3): 2000–01, 2003–04, 2004–05 * Scottish League Cup: 2000–01 * UEFA Cup runners-up: 2002–03 ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:French football managers Category:Footballers from Réunion
title: Didier Agathe
